metadata.name: Personal Space 2021
metadata.description:
Personal Space 2021, Art and Music by Joy Jo, 30sec, 2021


Beyond those days when I was suffering from longing for my own space, these days, I have several spaces where I can lay down my body and thoughts comfortably.

Instead of anger and lack, gratitude and awe permeated the reconstructed mindscape.

In my 20s, I thought of the universe as an extension of my personal space, but in my mid-30s, my universe entered a period of stability, ascension, and immersion.


[Note] This NFT is the 'Revised Video' version of the 'Physical Painting' and it doesn't include the physical canvas piece below.

*본 NFT는 아래 실물 회화를 기반으로 재구성한 비디오 작품이며, 실물 캔버스 작품은 본 NFT에 포함되지 않습니다.  

우주, 개인적 공간의 확장 |  Personal Space, Acrylic on canvas, 100×100cm, 2011
